titleStmt.title: Letter from Matilda O'Donald to Eartha M. M. White. April 26, 1951.
titleStmt.author: Matilda O'Donald

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Author thanks White for her gift of a basket.

objectDesc.p: A handwritten letter from O'Donald to White written on 4/26/1951. It is accompanied by its envelope.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." body.p:
Such a
delightful surprise you
gave me today does not
happen often. When I
opened the box and found
this beautiful, spring-like
basket,] I was charmed.
You were so sweet to
send it to me and I
shall cherish it as the
gift of a dear friend.
Many, many thanks and
love to you.
